Package es.nlp.uned.weps.evaluation

Class Summary
ClusteringEvaluation This class holds the results for different clustering evaluation measures using a key and an answer clusterings.
Logging  
SimpleScorer The Class SimpleScorer evaluates a single clustering solution.
SystemScorer The Class MultiSystemScorer evaluates a set of systems and outputs the final ranking.
TeamEvaluation The Class TeamEvaluation.
UnanimityEvaluation The Class UnanimityEvaluation implements the Unanimity metric combination method.
WePS2007Handler The Class WePS2007Handler is a XML handler for the WePS 2007 clustering format.
